resources.string: 404\n Even the things we love break sometimes,thanks for your patience while we put the pieces back together. Please contact support if the issue persists
Communication with server failed, please try again.
Cannot establish a connection to the server, please try again.
Resource not found, please try again.
Slow internet connection or Server is currently not responding, please try again.
An error occurred, please try again.
Error: No internet connection available. Please check your connection and try again later.
